summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Valentine invitation website for 'Koco'. All features working perfectly including realistic teddy bear, envelope animations, paper unfolding, interactive buttons, confetti celebration, and mobile responsiveness.
passed_tests: Landing page loads with realistic teddy bear holding red heart with warm glow
Dark romantic background with floating heart particles animation
Envelope overlay with 'Click me' text and heart seal works correctly
Teddy bear click transitions smoothly to envelope screen
Envelope has cream/vintage paper texture as designed
Paper unfolding animation works with darker backdrop
Unfolded paper covers most of screen with vintage texture overlay
Text reads 'Koco, my love, will you be my Valentine?' exactly as specified
Yes button has red/coral gradient with shimmer effect
No button dodges on hover/click and shows 'Nice try ðŸ˜Œ' message
Confetti celebration triggers on Yes button click
Success screen shows 'Yay! Happy Valentine's, Koco' message
Mobile responsive design works perfectly at 375px width
All animations and transitions are smooth
